EmailTemplate.name: NDCe.04-28-21 BNK NDCe Email 4.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New White Paper: Modernize Your Enterprise Technology
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Netflix, Amazon, PayPal and other disruptive brands are creating the benchmark for consumer experience. Your current and prospective customers now expect the same seamless, intuitive and personalized experiences from you, too. And you can get these more easily than you think with NCR’s next-generation enterprise software. Read our white paper to explore how NCR’s enterprise technology gives you an agile, modern and fast ATM network that beats the competition every time. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
